name: Achilles Group
description: services for managing supply chain risk
overview:
Achilles Group Limited provides identification, qualification, evaluation, and monitoring services for managing supply chain risk. It offers sustainable procurement services, which include finding and selecting potential suppliers, and pre-qualifying, evaluating, and monitoring performances of suppliers. The company engages in gathering and providing online information about suppliers, such as financial performance, health, safety, environmental policy, CSR, products, and services data; providing total supplier management solutions, which offers organizations a view of supply chain risk, as well as validates and maintains information about suppliers; and developing global business directories, which is a reference for buyers to provide information about suppliers. Its evaluation services include approvals that merge information about suppliers from various sources, such as audit reports, performance feedbacks, scorings, and additional information; audit and assessment services; carbon reduction programs; e-Qual services and SMS services, which allow buyers to ask further qualification questions to registered suppliers; and scoring, which is a numerical assessment process to provide buyers with an additional tool to enable swift comparisons between supplier pre-qualification information provided in a questionnaire. The company also provides performance feedback tools and document management services; contract notices; and EC procurement legislations, such as decision support packages, and procurement legislation training and consultancy. It serves construction, mining, oil and gas, pharmaceutical, public sector, transportation, and utility industries, as well as information, communication, and technology sectors. The company was formerly known as Gamedean Limited and changed its name to Achilles Group Limited in 2000.

Achilles Group Limited was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Abingdon, the United Kingdom.
